title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered. Then, I open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
EB: After deleting the first working set, the package view should still be filtered based on the second working set.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it to filter the package view. 2. Open the working set dialog again. 3. Create a second working set. 4. Delete the first working set. Observe that the package view is still filtered based on the second working set.
